column1: For headaches  hot water with orange peels can help. Add a bit of milk and it can also help you sleep. (You should probably use organic oranges)
Granted real progress will have to wait until January when new lenses will hopefully help with me getting headaches an hour into writing  but hey! Progress is progress!
